software.description: Brainnetome Atlas Viewer(v1.0) shows the anatomical connectivity-based parcellation results, including the maximum probabilistic maps,probabilistic maps and both the anatomical and functional connectivity patterns, which have been developed in Brainnetome Center(http://www.brainnetome.org/), CASIA. The atlas is based on the analysis of connectional architecture with in vivo multi-modal MRI data during the last 6 years. Please see more details in our homepage: http://atlas.brainnetome.org/
software.maintainer: Institute of Automation.Chinese Academy of Sciences
